(:action train ; Train an entity and update its status
  :parameters (?trainer - agent ?entity - trainable)
  :precondition (and (agent ?trainer) (untrained ?entity))
  :effect (and (trained ?entity) (not (untrained ?entity))

(:action evolve ; Evolve an entity with necessary conditions and resources
  :parameters (?npc - npc ?entity - object ?resource - resource_type)
  :precondition (and (npc ?npc) (unevolved ?entity) (or (trained ?entity) (has_resource ?entity ?resource)))
  :effect (and (evolved ?entity) (not (unevolved ?entity))

(:action copy ; Copy a resource and update its status
  :parameters (?entity - entity ?resource - resource)
  :precondition (and (not (copied ?resource)))
  :effect (and (copied ?resource) (has_resource ?entity ?resource))

(:action evolution ; Evolve an entity and update its state
  :parameters (?entity - object ?state_pre - state ?state_post - state)
  :precondition (and (entity ?entity) (in_state ?entity ?state_pre))
  :effect (and (in_state ?entity ?state_post) (not (in_state ?entity ?state_pre))
